R.I.P Randall Adams, died in obscurity of a brain tumor in Oct 2010, aged 61.  Got a belated note in Time Magazine in July 2011. 

Pretty sad for somebody who achieved so much after being wrongfully convicted (death sentence) and serving 12 years.
